name: authenticate_twitter
description: Authenticate a user with username and password. Always authenticate the user first.

name: post_tweet
description: Post a tweet for the authenticated user.

tags.description: List of tags for the tweet. Tag name should start with #.

mentions.description: List of users mentioned in the tweet. Mention name should start with @.

response.name: mentions
response.description: List of users mentioned in the tweet.

name: retweet
description: Retweet a tweet for the authenticated user.

tweet_id.description: ID of the tweet to retweet.

name: comment
description: Comment on a tweet for the authenticated user.

tweet_id.description: ID of the tweet to comment on.

name: mention
description: Mention specified users in a tweet.

tweet_id.description: ID of the tweet where users are mentioned.

mentioned_usernames.description: List of usernames to be mentioned.

name: follow_user
description: Follow a user for the authenticated user.

username_to_follow.description: Username of the user to follow.

response.name: follow_status
response.description: True if followed, False if already following.

name: list_all_following
description: List all users that the authenticated user is following.

response.name: following_list
response.description: List of all users that the authenticated user is following.

name: unfollow_user
description: Unfollow a user for the authenticated user.

username_to_unfollow.description: Username of the user to unfollow.

response.name: unfollow_status
response.description: True if unfollowed, False if not following.

tweet_id.description: ID of the tweet to retrieve.

response.name: mentions
response.description: List of users mentioned in the tweet.

name: get_user_tweets
description: Retrieve all tweets from a specific user.

username.description: Username of the user whose tweets to retrieve.

response.name: user_tweets
response.description: List of dictionaries, each containing tweet information.

name: search_tweets
description: Search for tweets containing a specific keyword.

keyword.description: Keyword to search for in tweets.

response.name: matching_tweets
response.description: List of dictionaries, each containing tweet information.

name: get_tweet_comments
description: Retrieve all comments for a specific tweet.

tweet_id.description: ID of the tweet to retrieve comments for.

response.name: comments
response.description: List of dictionaries, each containing comment information.

name: get_user_stats
description: Get statistics for a specific user.

username.description: Username of the user to get statistics for.

response.name: retweet_count
response.description: Number of retweets made by the user.
